ui.name: Fordham IT
ui.description: Document Search Powered by Vertex AI
ui.custom_css: .logo-container img { display: none !important; } .logo-container svg { display: none !important; } .logo-container .logo-text { display: none !important; } .logo-container .logo-img { display: none !important; } .logo-container::before { content: 'Fordham IT'; font-size: 28px; font-weight: bold; color: #900028; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; } img[alt='Chainlit'] { display: none !important; } svg[data-testid='logo'] { display: none !important; } .cl-header-logo-container { visibility: hidden !important; } .cl-header-logo-container::before { content: 'Fordham IT'; visibility: visible; display: block; font-size: 28px; font-weight: bold; color: #900028; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; position: absolute; }
